

   ----------------------------------------------------------------------
         README file for Web Markup Minifier: MVC Extensions 0.9.2

   ----------------------------------------------------------------------

          Copyright 2014 Andrey Taritsyn - http://www.taritsyn.ru
		  
		  
   ===========
   DESCRIPTION
   ===========   
   WebMarkupMin.Mvc contains 4 action filters: MinifyHtmlAttribute (for 
   minification of HTML code), MinifyXhtmlAttribute (for minification of 
   XHTML code), MinifyXmlAttribute (for minification 
   of XML code) and CompressContentAttribute (for compression of text 
   content by using GZIP or Deflate).

   =============
   DOCUMENTATION
   =============
   See more detailed information on CodePlex -
   http://webmarkupmin.codeplex.com
